text: The Landscape of the Pico Island Vineyard Culture is a Unesco World Heritage Site on Pico Island. The vineyard is divided into plots (currais) protected by walls (paredes, murinhos). The walls are built with basalt blocks that have been weathered and broken up and stacked without mortar.
